          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sacrificial protection of steel with magnesium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Opferschutz des Stahls mit Magnesium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Protection sacrificatoire d'acier avec du 
magnésium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Proteção sacrificial do aço com magnésio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Protezione sacrificial di acciaio con magnesio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θυσιαστική προστασία του χάλυβα με το μαγνήσιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Protección sacrificatoria del acero con magnesio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the magnesium bars protecting a steel pipeline from the electrolyte-containing soil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrolytes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pipelines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sacrificial protection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">soil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steel</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Magnesiumstäbe, die 
eine Stahlrohrleitung vor dem Elektrolyt-enthaltenen Boden schützen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les barres de 
magnésium protégeant une canalisation en acier contre le sol 
électrolyte-contenant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as barras do magnésio 
que protegem um encanamento de aço do solo eletrólito-contendo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le barre del magnesio
che proteggono una conduttura d'acciaio dal terreno 
elettrolito-contenente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ράβδους μαγνήσιου που 
προστατεύουν μια σωλήνωση χάλυβα από το ηλεκτρολύτης-περιέχοντας
χώμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las barras del magnesio 
que protegen una tubería de acero contra el suelo electro'lito-que 
contiene.</string>
          </description>
